I’m a Professor for Information Management at the [Berlin School of Library and Information Science](https://www.ibi.hu-berlin.de/de/forschung/infomanagement) at [Humboldt-Universität zu Berlin](http://hu-berlin.de) and a Scientific Consultant for Open Science at the [Helmholtz Association’s](https://www.helmholtz.de/) [Open Science Office](https://os.helmholtz.de/).

On this website you will find some information about my work.

<h2>Blogging</h2>

I’m trying my best to blog regularly on innovations in scholarly communications at <i class="bi bi-wordpress"></i> [wisspub.net](http://wisspub.net/).

<h2>Contact</h2>
